data.comment: The match is underway in Mechelen.
Goal! Tarik Tissoudali gives Beerschot a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 18, Ismaila Coulibaly (Beerschot) has received a first yellow card.
Frederic Frans has the misfortune to make it 1-1 through an own goal.
Great play from Joachim Van Damme to set up the goal.
In the minute 39, At AFAS Stadion, Jordi Vanlerberghe has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Beerschot's Tom Pietermaat has been booked in Mechelen.
Ayrton Mboko is on target to give Mechelen a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 44, That's a fine assist from Nikola Storm.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 60, Aster Vranckx (Mechelen) has been shown a straight red card by referee Lawrence Visser.
Nikola Storm is booked for the home team.
Geoffry Hairemans for Mechelen has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 69, Jan Van den Bergh equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
Raphael Holzhauser instrumental with a fine assist.
Rob Schoofs (Mechelen) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Tarik Tissoudali with Blessing Eleke. This is the first substitution made today by Hernan Losada.
Thibault Peyre is replacing Kerim Mrabti for Mechelen at AFAS Stadion.
Goal! Beerschot have taken a 2-3 lead courtesy of a header from Ismaila Coulibaly.
In the minute 80, Jan Van den Bergh with an assist there.
The away team replace Ayrton Mboko with Abdoulie Sanyang.
Mechelen make their second substitution with William Togui replacing Siemen Voet.
In the minute 85, Onur Kaya is on a sub for Rob Schoofs for Mechelen.
Hernan Losada (Beerschot) is making a third substitution, with Dario Van Den Buijs replacing Yan Vorogovskiy.
Full-time! The final score is 2-3.
